<title level="1" right="Rules">[Abjuration](/Rules.aspx?ID=262)</title>

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 297 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
[Abjurations](/Traits.aspx?ID=2) protect and ward. They create barriers that keep out attacks, effects, or even certain types of creatures. They also create effects that harm trespassers or banish interlopers.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
